title: Harry Potter Series
description: Harry Potter is a series of fantasy movies originally written as books by British author J. K. Rowling. The movies chronicle the life of a young wizard, Harry Potter, and his friends Hermione Granger and Ron Weasley, all of whom are students at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. These are in order based on their original theatrical release date.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
questEntries.description: Nineteen years after the formation of the Empire, Luke Skywalker is thrust into the struggle of the Rebel Alliance when he meets Obi-Wan Kenobi.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
questEntries.description: The green-as-grass hero from the first film, is now a seasoned space warrior

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
questEntries.description: In the epic conclusion of the saga, the Empire prepares to crush the Rebellion with a more powerful Death Star while the Rebel fleet mounts a massive attack on the space station.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
questEntries.description: The evil Trade Federation, led by Nute Gunray is planning to take over the peaceful world of Naboo. Jedi Knights Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi are sent to confront the leaders. But not everything goes to plan.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
questEntries.description: Now 20, young Anakin Skywalker is an apprentice to respected Jedi knight Obi-Wan Kenobi. Unusually powerful in the Force, Anakin is also impatient, arrogant, and headstrong.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
questEntries.description: After a fierce battle in which Obi-Wan and Anakin join Republic forces to help free Chancellor Palpatine from the evil Count Dooku and his minions.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1
questEntries.description: Three decades after the Empire's defeat, a new threat arises in the militant First Order.

questEntries.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 2
questEntries.description: In a time of conflict, a group of unlikely heroes band together on a mission to steal the plans to the Death Star.
